title: Learn Programming with OCaml
description: An introductory OCaml textbook focused on algorithms and data structures.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: A rigorous yet comprehensive book on algorithms, widely used in academia.
authors: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein

title: The Art Of Computer Programming
description: A deep and very influential multi-volume series on classical algorithms.

title: The Algorithm Design Manual
description: A practical textbook that bridges algorithm design and real-world problem solving.

title: Algorithms
description: A programming-oriented guide to algorithms, featuring detailed and clear Java implementations.

title: Purely Functional Data Structures
description: An essential reading for the Functional Programming enthusiasts.

title: Software Foundations
description: A foundational series on formal methods, program semantics, and verified software engineering.

title: Functional Data Structures and Algorithms
description: A formally verified functional algorithms textbook, using the Isabelle proof assistant.
